text: The 2007 Møbelringen Cup was held in Sandefjord, Skien and Drammen, Norway. The tournament started on 23 November 2007 and finished on 25 November. Norway won the event on goal difference ahead of Russia and Denmark. ==Results== {| class=wikitable style="text-align:center" !width=220|Team !width=20|Pts !width=20|Pld !width=20|W !width=20|D !width=20|L !width=20|PF !width=20|PA !width=20|GD |- bgcolor=#ccffcc |align=left| Norway |4||3||2||0||1||83||63|| +20 |- bgcolor= |align=left| Russia |4||3||2||0||1||82||72|| +10 |- bgcolor= |align=left| Denmark |4||3||2||0||1||76||83|| -7 |- bgcolor= |align=left| Angola |0||3||0||0||3||66||89|| -23 |} 23 November 2007, Sandefjord {| style="text-align:center" !width=200| !width=100| !width=200| |- |align=right|Denmark |25-24 |align=left| Russia |- |align=right|Norway |26-17 |align=left| Angola |} 24 November 2007, Skien {| style="text-align:center" !width=200| !width=100| !width=200| |- |align=right|Russia |32-24 |align=left| Angola |- |align=right|Norway |34-20 |align=left| Denmark |} 25 November 2007, Drammen {| style="text-align:center" !width=200| !width=100| !width=200| |- |align=right|Angola |25-31 |align=left| Denmark |- |align=right|Norway |23-26 |align=left| Russia |} ==References== *Official Site Moebelringen Cup 2007 Category:2007 in Norwegian sport
